column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A Chinese man driving a Lexus RX-300 hit the road divider------ at 12:00 am on the 10th of December 2018
column6: Khan Daun Penh.------According to the source
column8: two Chinese in the car were travelling at high speed before hitting the black and yellow concrete.------After the incident
column9: local authorities came down and took the vehicle to Phnom Penh Road Traffic Office to resolve the matter.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/394253
